All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminController
    The list of APIs for the administrator.
    API
    Class containing the available APIs to invoke.
    APIFinalizer
    This class acts as interface between the server and the logic behind, by finalizing the API requests
    APIOutput
    POJO for casting the returning value and the associated outcome code to JSON
    Application
    This is the application entry point: its main duty is to setup a server to expose RESTful APIs.
    ClientController
    This class is the Controller for all the requests that correspond to API that clients can invoke, like read file, add file, get all files, ...
    ClientDAO  
    CryptoACActiveElement
    Class that defines an active element in the system.
    CryptoACElement
    Class that defines an element in the system, thus involved in Access Control process (i.e., assignable to a crypto AC tuple) More concrete examples are users, files, roles
    CryptoACLambda
    Interface to model the AWS Lambda function that can be invoked from the users.
    CryptoACLogger
    Class for logging errors, warnings and info in Application.
    CryptoACTuple
    General class for tuples in the crypto AC system.
    CryptoUtil
    This class is used to group all cryptographic related parameters (pki algorithm, key length, signing algorithm, ...)
    DAOCloud
    this abstract class described the operations to be implemented needed by the logic ("User" class) in order to access data stored in the "cloud".
    DAOCloudAWS
    This is the DAO implementation for AWS.
    DAOCloudLOCAL
    This class is an implementation of the DAOCloud interface for testing purposes.
    DAOException
    This is a custom exception supposed to be thrown by implementations of the DAO interface.
    ErrorController
    This class is the controller for the HTTP errors when returning HTML code.
    File
    Wrapper class for the files in the Access Control System.
    FileTuple
    The associated element of this tuple is obviously the related File.
    FileUtil  
    Filters
    Class wrapping filters to apply before/after a request has been received
    HTTPMethod
    sorry, but the PATCH method was not included in the default HTTPMethod enum
    InputToCryptoACLambda
    POJO (Plain Old Java Object) to wrap the data to send to the CryptoACLambda, thus the operation to perform and the related data
    JSONUtil
    This class wraps methods related to transformations from and to JSONs
    LoginController
    This class is the controller for what concerns the login and session of users (logging from a browser).
    OperationOutcomeCode
    This enumerator collects all the numeric codes used in CryptoAC, along with a specific message.
    OutputFromCryptoACLambda
    POJO (Plain Old Java Object) to wrap the data to receive from the CryptoACLambda, thus the outcome code and, in case, a more detailed error
    PARAMETER
    Class containing the parameters to use in the HTML forms.
    Permission
    Permission tuple to define the possible assignable permissions.
    PermissionTuple
    This tuple binds a Role and a File over a Permission.
    ProfileController
    This is the Controller for what is related to users' profiles: retrieval and updates
    RequestUtil
    Just a utility class for handling HTTP request and session parameters
    Role
    Wrapper class for the roles in the Access Control System.
    RoleTuple
    This tuple binds a user to a role, thus gives access to the role's keys.
    TEMPLATE
    Class containing the path of the velocity HTML templates to render
    TupleType
    CryptoACTuple Type to distinguish among tuples.
    User
    Wrapper class for the users in the Access Control System.
    ViewUtil
    This class is used to render HTML templates at run time.
